summary: A letter from the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a drive containing discovery materials related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signatory of the letter providing the password for discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being provided.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is part of the prosecution team handling the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Criminal Case Against Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ongoing federal criminal prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell under docket number 20 Cr. 330.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
MDCâ€”Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
It provides the password '19702020' for a drive containing discovery materials for inmate 02879-509 (Maxwell).
The case is identified as United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Audrey Strauss was the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York as of September 3, 2020.
The discovery materials were being sent to the Metropolitan Detention Center where Maxwell was held.
